Class DefaultTheory

java.lang.Object
org.tweetyproject.logics.rdl.syntax.DefaultTheory
All Implemented Interfaces:
BeliefBase
public class DefaultTheory extends Object implements BeliefBase
Models a default theory in Reiter's default logic, see [R. Reiter. A logic for default reasoning. Artificial Intelligence, 13:81â€“132, 1980].
Author:
Matthias Thimm, Nils Geilen
